SmallTabs Styleguide

Elements

Elements are the foundation of the system. Simply using typography and color, well designed Elements can begin to express the site's personality.

  • Typefaces & Scale
  • Headings
  • Color Palette

Components

Elements are combined and sometimes modified to create components. Components are designed to serve specific functional roles within the system.

  • Tag list
  • Site Header
  • Site Footer
  • Recently Updated block
  • Recently Added block
  • Promote Your Bar block
  • Nearby Bars list
  • Map
  • Listing Rollup
  • Finder
  • Featured Bar
  • Day of the Week list
  • Contact list

Templates

Templates are the specific page structures. They are as you might imagine, populated with... Components.

  • General Page
SmallTabs is a product created by @mattmesker, @patrickgrady and @meskermichael.
